titles.title: Native Hawaiian Medicaid Coverage Act of 2004

A bill to amend title XIX of the Social security Act to provide 100 percent reimbursement for medical assistance provided to a Native Hawaiian through a federally-qualified health center or a Native Hawaiian health care system.
Native Hawaiian Medicaid Coverage Act of 2004

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Native Hawaiian Medicaid Coverage Act of 2004 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to provide full reimbursement for medical assistance provided to a Native Hawaiian through a federally-qualified health center or a Native Hawaiian health care system.
